1003000.name: DragoonWorld Online
1003000.description:
Welcome to Punishment Darkness Online, an online 2D Apocalyptic Post game, where you'll be waiting for a fantastic adventure, Zombie and good friendships. With hundreds of hours of play and inspired by the style of classic RPGs, you'll be immersed in this epic role-playing experience where you can conquer dungeons, fight incredible creatures, explore the vast continents, friends and much more.

Feature:
Evolutive class
You have the choice to choose your class: Survivor, Veteran, Sniper, Doctor, Aspirant, Ghoul this class will change to a certain level of games at 40 and 60
The World Map is Finished
Missions are almost all implemented
More than 200 Weapons, Armors & Objects
4 Type of Money
Manufacturing & Harvesting
Group Mode
Friends list
Not far from 200 monster type (Zombie, Human, Machine, Parasite, Modified Human, Modified Zombie)
and much more is still waiting for you!
